column4: when i connect using mac os x or another linux machine i am able to reach shared folder without any user/pass. I experience this problem only with win xp. What if i add a username/pass , will this username/pass be required in any filesharing sessions(also using linux - linux or OSX-linux)?
Samba needs it's own user/pass nfs etc use unix users. Take a look at smbpassword.

NemesisUK: when i say filesharing i mean the same shared folder over samba protocol. so the username/pass i will give to this sharing will be requested everytime i connect to it, from any kind of O.S.
in the Shared Folders app should be an options to set workgroup.
